section.title: profit centers master list of numbers for Profit Center Numbers
section.para: To access the master list of Profit Center Numbers, select the "List Profit Center Numbers" option. The following screen will appear:
The "Profit Centers" screen displays information on all existing Profit Centers, including Profit Center Number and Profit Center description.

note.para: The use of Profit Centers can be enabled or disabled by default at the system level.
